description: TheEver Red Lace-Leaf Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Ever Red') offers a stunning array of colour, from fiery oranges and reds in the summer through to brilliant scarlets and russets in the fall. Its vibrant foliage is sure to catch the eye of any passer-by, and its delicate 'lace-like' leaves add an extra dimension of beauty to any garden. When grown in a sheltered location, theEver Red Lace-Leaf Japanese Maple is incredibly low maintenance and requires minimal pruning to thrive. Enjoy this species as a bright and bold statement piece in any garden space.
